snippet: The actions appeared to signal an accelerated effort by the United States to squeeze Iran economically over the lack of progress in negotiations on its disputed nuclear program.
abstract: United States expands roster of those violating Iran sanctions, blacklisting four Iranian companies and one individual suspected of helping the country enrich nuclear fuel; actions appear to signal accelerated effort to squeeze Iran economically over the lack of progress in negotiations on its disputed nuclear program.
lead_paragraph: The actions appeared to signal an accelerated effort by the United States to squeeze Iran economically over the lack of progress in negotiations on its disputed nuclear program.

headline.seo: U.S. Imposes Sanctions on Those Aiding Iran
headline.main: U.S. Imposes Sanctions on Those Aiding Iran
headline.print_headline: U.S. Imposes Sanctions On Those Aiding Iran

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Office of Foreign Assets Control (United States Treasury)
